definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: He saw only her long chestnut lashes , permeated with shadow and modesty.
sentences.chinese: 他只見到栗色的長睫毛，掩映着幽嫺貞靜的神態。

sentences.english: All men are afraid of eyelash curlers.
The special formulation of curliness make eyelash hold out for long time keep the curliness.
sentences.chinese: 獨特的旋翹配方使睫毛持久保持旋翹。

sentences.english: Hold applicator at a slight angle and apply color to the base of the lashes.
sentences.chinese: 以稍微傾斜的角度拿着眼線筆，從睫毛的根部上色。

sentences.english: The use of unhygienic mascaras may greatly increase the risk of eye infection or inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 使用不衛生的睫毛液會增加眼睛受感染或發炎機會。

sentences.english: When removing mascara, brush from inner side of the eyelashes to the outer side.
sentences.chinese: 卸除睫毛膏要從根部向梢部擦拭。

sentences.english: Wipe the wand off before the first coat to prevent clumping.
sentences.chinese: 把睫毛棒刷乾淨，避免結塊。

sentences.english: Do you have a good thickening mascara?
sentences.chinese: 你們有賣濃稠式睫毛膏嗎？

sentences.english: TT: Trachomatous Trichiasis. At least one eyelash rubs on the eyeball.
sentences.chinese: 沙眼性倒睫，至少一根睫毛摩擦眼球。

sentences.english: He admired again her grey-black eyebrows, and her lashes.
sentences.chinese: 辛森又一次羨慕起她灰黑的眼眉和睫毛。

sentences.english: Most likely you look great with some bronzer and a couple strokes of mascara.
sentences.chinese: 打上黃色眼影，塗上睫毛膏，你很可能看起來很漂亮。

sentences.english: I read the reviews for Ardell and decided to try it.
sentences.chinese: 我讀了關於愛戴爾睫毛增長液的評論並決定試一試。

sentences.english: Night uses oily inunction, can promote eyelash to grow, shock.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚用油塗擦，能促進睫毛生長，濃密。

sentences.english: This Rimmel Maxxxx Effect mascara is fantastic.
sentences.chinese: 這個睫毛膏真是太棒了。

sentences.english: You're afraid of an eyelash curler.
Do a second coat with the same mascara and let set for a minute.
sentences.chinese: 用同一只睫毛膏刷第二次，然後停一會，等它凝固。

definition: plump lower eyelids (considered to be an attractive feature)
